entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android & iOS] dialog theme doesn't change on changing UserAppTheme #24558
  • [Android, 9.0 Preview 7] Overriding OnKeyUp in MainActivity does not capture keyboard presses #24557
  • Shell navigation back is not working after update 2 pages 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls' and 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility' #24555
  • xcrun -find bitcode_strip is running every time I deploy locally to an iPad #24552

Closed

  • Shell Tab icons on android do not show if a page is set to visible and navigated to immediately after. #23780
    Backlog
  • Shell Tabs on Android are sometimes not visually removed from view when IsVisible is set to false. #23717
    Backlog
  • Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #8788
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android & iOS] dialog theme change on changing UserAppTheme #24559
    area-theme
  • Avoid recomputing bindings multiple times and bind BindingContext first #24553
    community ✨

Merged

  • 894511 : Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24161
    area-controls-shell, community ✨

Updated

  • [iOS] Tab Selected Icon Color not changing if using Font icons - fix #22437
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-slider
  • Improve measure invalidation and legacy Layout(s) performance #24532
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Application Crash Due to Incorrect Use of <ReorderableItemsView> Instead of <CollectionView> for Reordering Items - fix #23221
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24523
    area-infrastructure
